item.title: Honorable Education Minister Inaugurates 3rd Career Fair at Bylakupee
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Chief Guest, honorable Education Minister, Dr. (Mrs.) Pema Yangchen inaugurated the 3rd Career Fair at Lugsam Tibetan Community Hall on 12th September, 2018. Education Minister in her inaugural speech stressed on the importance and benefit of organizing such event to the students in making better career decision & motivated the students to ask the college...

item.title: Education Secretary Visits STS Kollegal
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Secretary Karma Singey, Department of Education during his official visit to STS Kollegal. Photo/DOE Kollegal: Secretary Karma Singey, Department of Education, CTA is on an official tour of the schools in Kollegal, Gurupura, Bylakuppe and Mundgod that were transferred to Sambhota Tibetan Schools Society (STSS) from Central Tibetan Schools Administration (CTSA) in...

item.title: Awareness Talk Series on Secular ethics in Nepal and Northern India completed
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Dharamsala: The Department of Education (DoE) of the Central Tibetan Administration (CTA) ended its third leg of 6-month awareness talk series on Secular ethics to the students, teachers and general public in Tibetan schools and settlements in Nepal, Ladakh and Doon valley. Geshe Yeshi Gyaltsen, DoE’s mentor on Secular Ethics was recently in Nepal from...

item.title: Inaugural ceremony of Teachers Training for B.Ed. in Tibetan
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Education Department, CTA organized one and a half year training for Bachelors of Education in Tibetan as per Basic Education Policy at College for Higher Tibetan Studies, Sarah and Education Kalon Dr. Pema Yangchen inagurated the opening ceremony as a Chief Guest on 2 July 2018. Principal of Sarah College and trainers of the...

item.title: Schools Heads Must Be Instructional Leaders: Education Kalon Dr. Pema Yangchen at the EGR Workshop for School Heads
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: BIR: Kalon Dr. Pema Yangchen, Department of Education, CTA inaugurated the second series of Early Grade Reading (EGR) workshop for school heads from 19th to 22nd June. This was her maiden visit to Bir and Kalon was welcomed by the settlement officers of Bir Dege and BTS. She also visited Sambhota Tibetan School, Bir and...
